text: 哈嘍，大家好
pinyin: hā lóu ， dà jiā hǎo
english: Hello everyone

text: 歡迎來到Z頻道的大馬番薯日記
pinyin: huān yíng lái dào Z pín dào de dà mǎ fān shǔ rì jì
english: Welcome to Channel Z’s Malaysian Sweet Potato Diary

text: 我是傑克
pinyin: wǒ shì jié kè
english: I'm Jack

text: 今天呢
pinyin: jīn tiān ne
english: What about today?

text: 我要跟大家分享
pinyin: wǒ yào gēn dà jiā fēn xiǎng
english: I want to share with you

text: 我剛剛突發奇想的一個Idea啦
pinyin: wǒ gāng gāng tū fā qí xiǎng de yī gè Idea la
english: I just came up with an idea.

text: 其實呢我從新加坡回到馬來西亞生活呢
pinyin: qí shí ne wǒ cóng xīn jiā pō huí dào mǎ lái xī yà shēng huó ne
english: Actually, I came back to live in Malaysia from Singapore.

text: 要將近兩年了
pinyin: yào jiāng jìn liǎng nián le
english: It will be nearly two years

text: 所以呢我剛就突然間想到
pinyin: suǒ yǐ ne wǒ gāng jiù tū rán jiān xiǎng dào
english: So I just suddenly thought

text: 想跟大家分享一下
pinyin: xiǎng gēn dà jiā fēn xiǎng yī xià
english: I want to share it with you

text: 「住」馬來西亞
pinyin: 「 zhù 」 mǎ lái xī yà
english: "Live" in Malaysia

text: 跟「租」新加坡
pinyin: gēn 「 zū 」 xīn jiā pō
english: "Rent" Singapore

text: 到底有什麼不同
pinyin: dào dǐ yǒu shén me bù tóng
english: What's the difference?

text: 我覺得影片出去了過後噢
pinyin: wǒ jué dé yǐng piàn chū qù le guò hòu ō
english: I think after the video is released,

text: 肯定會有人講
pinyin: kěn dìng huì yǒu rén jiǎng
english: Someone will definitely talk about it

text: 哎呀
pinyin: āi yā
english: oops

text: 如果你之前在新加坡買屋子
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ zhī qián zài xīn jiā pō mǎi wū zi
english: If you have bought a house in Singapore before

text: 你就不會有這種煩惱了
pinyin: nǐ jiù bù huì yǒu zhè zhǒng fán nǎo le
english: You won't have this kind of trouble anymore

text: 所以呢我在這裡要做一個disclaimer
pinyin: suǒ yǐ ne wǒ zài zhè lǐ yào zuò yī gè disclaimer
english: So I'm going to make a disclaimer here

text: 就是這支影片哦
pinyin: jiù shì zhè zhī yǐng piàn ó
english: This is the video

text: 是applicable for
pinyin: shì applicable for
english: is applicable for

text: 在新加坡沒有買房子
pinyin: zài xīn jiā pō méi yǒu mǎi fáng zi
english: Didn’t buy a house in Singapore

text: 在新加坡租房子
pinyin: zài xīn jiā pō zū fáng zi
english: Rent a house in Singapore

text: 但是呢在馬來西亞擁有自己屋子的人
pinyin: dàn shì ne zài mǎ lái xī yà yōng yǒu zì jǐ wū zi de rén
english: But what about people who own their own houses in Malaysia?

text: 那其實就是我自己本身的狀況啦
pinyin: nà qí shí jiù shì wǒ zì jǐ běn shēn de zhuàng kuàng la
english: That's actually my own situation.

text: 這是為了避免一些酸民在那邊耍嘴炮
pinyin: zhè shì wèi le bì miǎn yī xiē suān mín zài nà biān shuǎ zuǐ pào
english: This is to prevent some sarcastic people from talking nonsense over there.

text: 好
pinyin: hǎo
english: good

text: 那麼現在呢就來跟你們分享一下
pinyin: nà me xiàn zài ne jiù lái gēn nǐ men fēn xiǎng yī xià
english: So now let me share it with you

text: 我覺得啦
pinyin: wǒ jué dé la
english: I think

text: “住”馬來西亞跟“租”新加坡最大的不同哦
pinyin: “ zhù ” mǎ lái xī yà gēn “ zū ” xīn jiā pō zuì dà de bù tóng ó
english: The biggest difference between “living” in Malaysia and “renting” in Singapore

text: 就是關於
pinyin: jiù shì guān yú
english: is about

text: 門禁這件事情
pinyin: mén jìn zhè jiàn shì qíng
english: The matter of access control

text: 這個是我親身經歷的啦
pinyin: zhè gè shì wǒ qīn shēn jīng lì de la
english: This is what I have experienced personally

text: 所謂的門禁就是
pinyin: suǒ wèi de mén jìn jiù shì
english: The so-called access control is

text: 到了一定的鐘點噢
pinyin: dào le yí dìng de zhōng diǎn ō
english: It's a certain hour

text: 他就不給你進去了
pinyin: tā jiù bù gěi nǐ jìn qù le
english: He won't let you in

text: 他會把那個鎖頭鎖掉
pinyin: tā huì bǎ nà gè suǒ tóu suǒ diào
english: He'll take that lock off

text: 我記得我第一次租的那間房子啦
pinyin: wǒ jì dé wǒ dì yī cì zū de nà jiān fáng zi la
english: I remember the house I rented for the first time

text: 那個屋主哦
pinyin: nà gè wū zhǔ ó
english: That house owner

text: 在每天的晚上11點哦
pinyin: zài měi tiān de wǎn shàng 11 diǎn ó
english: At 11 o'clock every night

text: 他就會把那個鎖頭鎖掉的
pinyin: tā jiù huì bǎ nà gè suǒ tóu suǒ diào de
english: He will take that lock off

text: 如果你是超過11點才要回來的話
pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ shì chāo guò 11 diǎn cái yào huí lái de huà
english: If you don’t come back until after 11 o’clock

text: 一定要跟你的室友溝通好
pinyin: yí dìng yào gēn nǐ de shì yǒu gōu tōng hǎo
english: Be sure to communicate well with your roommates

text: 叫他11點過後來跟你開門
pinyin: jiào tā 11 diǎn guò hòu lái gēn nǐ kāi mén
english: Ask him to open the door for you after 11 o'clock

text: 那住在馬來西亞自己的房子呢
pinyin: nà zhù zài mǎ lái xī yà zì jǐ de fáng zi ne
english: What about living in your own house in Malaysia?

text: 就絕對不會有這樣子的問題啦
pinyin: jiù jué duì bù huì yǒu zhè yàng zi de wèn tí la
english: There will never be such a problem

text: 那為什麼會有這樣子的問題呢
pinyin: nà wèi shén me huì yǒu zhè yàng zi de wèn tí ne
english: Then why is there such a problem?

text: 其實哦就是屋主本身
pinyin: qí shí ó jiù shì wū zhǔ běn shēn
english: In fact, it’s the owner himself

text: 他沒有把那個鎖頭的鎖匙給租客
pinyin: tā méi yǒu bǎ nà gè suǒ tóu de suǒ shi gěi zū kè
english: He didn't give the key to the lock to the tenant

text: 如果是往自己的家里安全去想的話
pinyin: rú guǒ shì wǎng zì jǐ de jiā lǐ ān quán qù xiǎng de huà
english: If you are thinking about the safety of your own home,

text: 這個屋主的做法呢是情有可原啦
pinyin: zhè gè wū zhǔ de zuò fǎ ne shì qíng yǒu kě yuán la
english: What this homeowner did is excusable.

text: 但是如果住在馬來西亞
pinyin: dàn shì rú guǒ zhù zài mǎ lái xī yà
english: But if you live in Malaysia

text: 自己的屋子就絕對不會有這樣子的問題
pinyin: zì jǐ de wū zi jiù jué duì bù huì yǒu zhè yàng zi de wèn tí
english: Your own house will never have such a problem

text: 因為鎖匙全部都是自己拿的
pinyin: yīn wèi suǒ shi quán bù dōu shì zì jǐ ná de
english: Because I hold all the keys myself

text: 再來呢
pinyin: zài lái ne
english: Come again
